text:
is a Japanese professional football club in Niigata.
In 2012, Masaaki Yanagishita was named coach.
History.
The club was founded in 1955.
Notable achievement.
The team has some notable achievements.
In 2009, Pedro Bispo Moreira Júnior made three goals in one game against Sanfrecce Hiroshima.
In 2010, Marcio Richardez scored three times in one game against Vegalta Sendai.
